name: Mad Piper
movement: walks at a speed of 30 feet
description: The Mad Piper embodies a bizarre and unsettling presence, utilizing a mixture of music and melee combat. It has a humanoid form with a musical instrument, likely used for its dirges and tunes.
memorable: Its ability to inspire allies and terrify enemies creates a dynamic and unpredictable presence on the battlefield.
goals: To inspire allies and instill fear in foes through music.
relations: Constructs or beings that rely on music for their abilities, as well as living manifestations of fear.
environment: Typically found in eerie settings or battlefields where its musical presence can be fully realized.
strengths: High Strength and Charisma, making it effective in melee and supportive roles.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity affects its initiative and agility.
attacks: Screaming Flail delivers heavy bludgeoning damage combined with thunder damage, while the Terrible Dirge instills fear in a wide area.
most_powerful_ability: Terrible Dirge, causing fear in enemies within range, potentially affecting multiple foes.
skills: Proficient in performance, enhancing its musical effectiveness.
additional_information: Immunities to various debilitating conditions like fear and poison.
Can inspire allies to improve their chances in critical situations.
Terrifies enemies, forcing them to save against its haunting tune.
Has a low passive perception indicating poor awareness of surroundings.
Uses music both to support allies and control the battlefield.
test_queries: large construct that plays haunting music
bizarre creature with powerful melody attacks
